com.xith3d.scenegraph
Interface GeomDataInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
GeomFloatData, GeomNioFloatData
public interface GeomDataInterface

A standard interface for manipulating geometry data. Underlying implementations can be use any storage and update method they want

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2000-2002

Company: Teseract Software, LLP

Author:
David Yazel

Method Detail

start

public void start()
resets the buffer to zero and prepares to receive data from the various set() calls. In some implementations this will destroy data.

public void setFloats(float[] a,

Special optimized way to set a bulk amount of floats right into the data, starting at the index specified

getFloatData

public float[] getFloatData()
Returns an array with all the floats assigned in the last draw cycle. In some implementations this might return a copy, so only use if you have to. The data should not be changed once it is retrieved and should be considered read only.

Returns:
An array of floats

get

public void get(int index,
                javax.vecmath.Tuple3f value)
get 3 values from the underlying buffer starting at position 3*index

Parameters:
index -
value -

getFloatBuffer

public FloatBuffer getFloatBuffer()
returns the NIO float buffer underlying this. If the underlying format is not a float buffer then it will be converted.

Returns:

getByteData

public byte[] getByteData()
Returns an array with all the bytes assigned in the last draw cycle. In some implementations this might return a copy, so only use if you have to. The data should not be changed once it is retrieved and should be considered read only.

Returns:
An array of byte

getInitialIndex

public int getInitialIndex()

getCount

public int getCount()

isDirty

public boolean isDirty()
Used by the renderer to know if cached geometry is now invalid. This is used even within a single run when binding vertex arrays

Returns:

setIsDirty

public void setIsDirty(boolean dirty)
used by the renderer to set the data as non-dirty, plus for any function which wishes to dirty the data.

Parameters:
dirty -
Returns:

duplicateGeomData

public GeomDataInterface duplicateGeomData(boolean copy)
Create same type of geometry data

Parameters:
copy - true if data should be copied
Returns:
new created geom data
